title: "Multivariate Walkthrough"
author: "UNK Stats"
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
output: pdf_document
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(UNKstats)

summary(iris)
```

```{r}
iris_data_only <- iris |> 
  select(-Species)
```

```{r}
iris_pca <- princomp(iris_data_only)

summary(iris_pca)
```

```{r}
iris_expanded <- cbind(iris, iris_pca$scores)

ggplot(iris_expanded, aes(x = Comp.1, 
                          y = Comp.2, 
                          colour = Species, 
                          shape = Species)) +
  geom_point(size = 3) + 
  theme_minimal() +
  ylab("PC 2") +
  xlab("PC 1") +
  # make colorblind friendly
  scale_color_viridis_d()
```
